limmen.controllers

Class InvoiceController

  • java.lang.Object
    • limmen.controllers.InvoiceController

  • @RestController
 @CrossOrigin
 @RequestMapping(value="/resources/invoices")
public class InvoiceController
extends java.lang.Object
    RestController for the resource pointed by the url: /resources/invoices*
    Author:
    Kim Hammar on 2016-03-22.
